dakshina adhiwegi margaye thunwana adiyara yatathe mathara sita hambanthota dakwa idikirim sidukarana suriyawawa pradeshayehi adhiwegi margayata pawara gath idam sadaha wandi mudal labadime poronduwa baladharin wisin mangahara athayi chodana karamin adhiwegi margaye katayuthu sadaha pas prawahanaya karana sthanayan haras karamin ema pradeshawasin janathawa ada (01) perawaruwe sita wirodhathawayaka niratha we.adhiwegi margaya hethuwen idam ahimiwuwan pirisak wisin pasugiya 24 wanada suriyawawa nagarayeda wirodhathawayak pawathwana ladi.ada dina wirodhathawaya sadaha adhiwegi margaye idikirim katayuthu sidu karana badiganthota, mahapalassa, nabadagaswawa, andaragaswawa, 350, 550,205yaya yana pradeshayanhi janathawa ekwa siti.mowun ema pradeshayan thula margaya awahira karamin sidukala wirodhathawaya hethuwen adhiwegi margaya idikirim katayuthu sadaha da badha athiwa thibe.wirodhathawaye niyali janathawa kiyasitinne thamanta sadharana wandi mudalak laba dena thuru mema wirodhathawaya ath noharina bawayi.
